definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.chinese: “RL瑞龙”，压花闪闪发光的金属单管齐马镫扣。

sentences.english: During her lifetime, she assembled a collection of pressed plants in a sixty-six page leather-bound herbarium.
sentences.chinese: 她曾将压花收集到一本66页的皮制封面的标本集中。

sentences.english: Milled groove; collects meat and fruit juices while cutting.
sentences.chinese: 压花凹槽，切割肉和水果时可汇集汁液。

sentences.english: Gladiator-inspired sandals are made of reptile-embossed synthetic leather.
sentences.chinese: 角斗士的灵感凉鞋的爬行动物压花合成革。

sentences.english: We are looking for soft, durable, embossed PVC leather.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找柔软的，耐用的压花聚氯乙烯皮革。

sentences.english: Do you really want to pay for embossing or engraving or custom design?
sentences.chinese: 你真的愿意支付的压花或雕刻或定制设计？

sentences.english: Sulfate and foils are the best board stocks to be used when embossing packaging materials.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸和箔板压花包装材料时要使用最好的股票。

sentences.english: Embossing with foil instead of ink can assist to eliminate cracking on coated stocks.
sentences.chinese: 压花铝箔带代替油墨，可以协助消除在涂层股票开裂。

sentences.english: Removable adjustable canvas shoulder strap with logo-embossed metal hardware.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸可调帆布图案压花金属硬件肩带。

sentences.english: Strip pattern high purity aluminum reflector.
sentences.chinese: 高纯铝反光板条形压花设计。

sentences.english: New quarter leather embossed brown rope DKNY fashion sexy high heels.
sentences.chinese: 对比浅棕色独特抢眼，压花绳带皮革装饰，露趾设计。

sentences.english: The surface of glue roller is embossed by netting design and plated by chrome treatment.
sentences.chinese: 上浆辊表面经网纹压花及镀铬处理。

sentences.english: There are two types of embossing.
Exposed top zip with two logo-embossed zip pulls.
sentences.chinese: 暴露了两个标志压花拉链顶部拉链拉。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
color printing using several overlaid images
